availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Henry Clay Sandidge (Cumberland County attorney and 15th District Commonwealth’s Attorney)

body.p: Cumberland County attorney and Fifteenth District Commonwealth’s Attorney. Kentucky native. Married America M. Allen. Fifteenth District Commonwealth’s Attorney from 1864 to 1867.

bibl.p: KYR-0001-004-1309. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, District 2, p. 71. Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts, of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending in October 10, 1867 (Frankfort, KY: John H. Harney, 1867), p. 354. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, Burkesville, p. 12. “John Henry Clay Sandidge,” Find A Grave, August 19, 2009, memorial no. 40867725. Kentucky Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates (1911-1955), Ancestry, 1935, Daviess County, file no. 9030.
